price: 68. Ee Rabbigaa baan ku dhaartaye, waanu soo kulmin iyaga iyo shaydaammadaba, markaas waxaanu keeni hareeraha jahannama iyagoo jilba joogsan11.
arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحۡشُرَنَّهُمۡ وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحۡضِرَنَّهُمۡ حَوۡلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيّٗا
footnotes: 11. Iyagoo kuf kufaya oo jilbahooda u dhacaya argagax darteed ama loo jiidayo Naarta iyagoo aan dooneyn oo jilbaha ku jooga oo dhulka ku jiidaya.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fawarabbika lanaḥshurannahum wal-shayāṭīna thumma lanuḥ'ḍirannahum ḥawla jahannama jithiyyan
